name: The Dilma
storyline:
You're a reporter that investigates a secret fictitious place apparently abandoned by Petrobrás, but you end up discovering a secret place of "PT" where there is evidence that could end up removing the president from office. Everything looks fine until the elevator "breaks", making the reporter find another way out to get out of there.
Being desperate and with no time left, Dilma takes her last attitude that changes the destiny of history and does everything to prevent the escape of the reporter.
summary: The Dilma is a game that mixes horror with a little political humor. With the antagonist being the ex-president of the Federative Republic of Brazil, Dilma Rousseff.
